JS Introduction

The major points of JS are given below:

  • JavaScript is a fun and flexible programming language. .
  • It's one of the core technologies of web development and can be used on both the front-end and the back-end.
  • While HTML and CSS are languages that give structure and colors to web pages, JavaScript makes them interactive and come alive.

JS statements

A computer program is a list of "instructions" to be "executed" by a computer.

In a programming language, these programming instructions are called statements.

  • let x, y, z; // Statement 1
  • x = 5; // Statement 2
  • y = 6; // Statement 3
  • z = x + y; // Statement 4
